title: Public Static Field Not Marked Final
overview: Public static variables can be read without an accessor and changed without a mutator by any classes in the application.
remediation: ::PHASE:Architecture and Design:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Clearly identify the scope for all critical data elements, including whether they should be regarded as static.::PHASE:Implementation:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Make any static fields private and constant. A constant field is denoted by the keyword &#x27;const&#x27; in C/C++ and &#x27; final&#x27; in Java::
